## UsageCollectionAllowedSchemaTypes type

Allowed types in the schema definition

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type AllowedSchemaTypes = 'keyword' | 'text' | 'number' | 'boolean' | 'long' | 'date' | 'float';
```
